title: Tiger Aspect - Wikipedia
snippet: The present-day company was founded in 1993 from the merger of Bennett-Jones' Tiger Television and Paul Sommers' Aspect Film & Television. It has also produced television dramas such as Murphy's Law and Sherlock Holmes and the Case of the Silk Stocking, and in October 2006, its drama series ...

title: Tiger Aspect Productions - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Tiger Aspect Productions is a British film and television production company of Peter Bennett-Jones, founded in 1993 from the merger between Tiger Television and Aspect Film & Television. In June 2006, the company was purchased by IMG Media, but ...

title: Tiger Aspect Productions - BlackBook Companies - BCG Pro
snippet: Originally known as Tiger Television, Tiger Aspect is one of the UK's most successful production companies, prolific across a broad range of programme genres. Originally an independent company, Tiger Aspect was bought by IMG Media in 2006 and ...

title: Tiger Aspect Productions Ltd. | Encyclopedia.com
snippet: Private Company Incorporated: 1988 as Tiger Productions Employees: 79 Sales: $59.7 million (2003) NAIC: 512110 Motion Picture, Video Tape Production Â· Tiger Aspect Productions Ltd. is one of the United Kingdom's most successful independent television and film production houses.

title: Tiger Aspect Productions (UK) | Closing Logo Group | Fandom
snippet: Background: Tiger Aspect Productions is a British film and television production company founded by Peter Bennett-Jones in 1988 as Tiger Television. The company did not yet use an onscreen logo until 1989.
